page.title: 04PASTIMES IN KEELBY
page.content: On Saturday I usually stay in the village playing with friends I play tennis on the courts with my friend . We go on the field which is a wide long stretch of grass where the village games and important events go on.My favourite thing to do on Saturdays is take some dogs for a walk with a friend to the woods or any where in the countryside and out of the way.In the woods it is cool and smells fresh of the trees.It is easy to walk through if you follow the path and is very pleasant.My hobby is horse riding and on Sundays I go riding with a friend who has two ponies.Also I play the violin and when I grow up I hope to be a naturlist.My name is Esme Copestake and I am 10 years old.
